resources.string:
<html>
                <head>
                    <meta charset="utf-8">
                    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, minimal-ui">
                    <link rel="stylesheet" href="github-markdown.css">
                    <style>
                        body {
                            box-sizing: border-box;
                            min-width: 200px;
                            max-width: 100%;
                            margin: 0 auto;
                            padding: 10px;
                            padding-top: 20px;
                        }
                    </style>
                </head>
	            <body>
	                <article class="markdown-body">
	                    %s
                    </article>
                </body>
            </html>
